Title: Bear Man
Writer: Joe Gayton (creator), Tony Gayton (creator), Max Hurwitz, Tom Brady (story editor), Michael C. Martin (staff writer), Jimmy Mero (staff writer)
Actors: Common, Robin McLeavy, Mo Brings Plenty, Brent Briscoe
Plot: We follow Bear Killer (Elam) as he is cared for by the Comanche after a bear fight. He becomes part of the tribe as they attack incoming blue coats. Bear Killers growing confusion forces him to seek out the railroad.
